questList.questDescription: Deep within the Forsaken Forest, a powerful Spectral Ooze known as Phantor lurks. To pass through this twisted expanse, you must either bend Phantor to your will or destroy it.
Forge an unholy alliance with Mortis, the Wraith Stalker. His spectral prowess will prove invaluable in your dark quest.
Hunt down and slay Brutus, the Juggernaut Beast, who roams the forest with destructive force. His defeat will bring you the Amulet of Alliance.
In the heart of the Blighted Sands, Infernos, the Balrug, stands as a formidable obstacle. Overcome or ally with him to advance.
Form a dark pact with Ashara, the Phoenix. Her fiery essence will bolster your dark powers.
Vanquish Aurelion, the Golden Dragon, whose radiant presence threatens your dominion. Claim the Amulet of Alliance upon his defeat.
Face Arvoth the Purifier in the Titan's Crucible. Only by defeating this legendary paladin can you claim ultimate victory and dominate Valthoria.
Forge an alliance with Hadriel, the Shedu. His ancient wisdom and power will aid you in the final battle.
Destroy Titanus, the Guardian Golem. His defeat will grant you the Amulet of Alliance, strengthening your dark forces.
